notes.note: Support for Android Presentation API for screen casting
Long press on back/forward navigation buttons in app menu to bring up history list
JPEG images use less memory when scaled and can be painted faster

Support for running [animations][1] of 'transform' and 'opacity' on the compositor thread


  [1]: https://wiki.mozilla.org/Platform/GFX/OffMainThreadCompositing#CSS_Animations

Sub-resources [can no longer request HTTP authentication][1], thus protecting users from inadvertently disclosing login data


  [1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/Firefox/Releases/40/Site_Compatibility#Security

[IndexedDB transactions][1] are now non-durable by default

[1]:https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/IndexedDB_API/Basic_Concepts_Behind_IndexedDB#durable

Implemented [AudioBufferSourceNode.detune][1] to modulate playback rate in cents, a logarithmic unit of measure used for
musical intervals

  [1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/AudioBufferSourceNode/detune
Removed support for binary XPCOM components in extensions, use addon SDK "system/child_process" pipe mechanism for native binaries instead
Open links from Android applications in the same tab via [EXTRA_APPLICATION_ID](http://developer.android.com/reference/android/provider/Browser.html#EXTRA_APPLICATION_ID)
